description:
Redan is a cryptocurrency trading platform, offers a state of the art, highly sophisticated hybrid platform. Unlike most exchanges that offer only cryptocurrency trading, Redan is uniquely positioning itself in the blockchain world by providing four modules under a single platform to offer a wide range of services to its customers.

As a unique security feature, committing to our values of security, all tokens stored on our exchange wallets are insured against cyber attacks and hacking.
name: REDAN
